turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place an order for pizza at Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: two large pizzas, the first being cheese only and the second being Hawaiian.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can I have those both as thin crust, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 large thin crust pizzas, 1 cheese, 1 hawaiin, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $48, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. No, that's it. Thank you.
